title: Riot, quick question about gifting
body:
So I want to gift Snow Fawn Poppy to a friend of mine, but we kinda... may or may not have a bet about who can get it for her first. I'd really like to know when the skin is availabe for gifting so I can be the first and gift it to her before she can buy it herself >:)
Anyway, thanks for reading this and have a good morning / day / evening / night!

---
_And remember, it's all for the sake of Ultimate Hope!_
- N. Komaeda

replies.body: This is a bet I can dig!  Very cool of you to gift your friend, but really we don't know for sure!  Patch notes offer previews of skins that are aimed for the patch, but it won't mean it will be on the same day.  Your best bet will be to keep an eye on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for new releases.

Oml, thanks!!

I needa know two things now.
 - What to bet for ?
 - Is there a surefire way to be the first to gift it?

Please answer me and I will be very glad! !

If I were a betting poro, it would be for fresh baked poro snax.  Even better if they don't know how to bake.  :D

No surefire way, best thing you can do is to keep an eye on the news page to see when it's available in the store!
